name: FomosFi
description: Burn $Fomos token and receive $FomosBuild to receive BNB as a reward. • $FomosBuild is determined by the amount of $Fomos burnt. • $FomosBuild gives you the amount of BNB equivalent that you have burnt. • Receive 2x returns on your amount Burnt (eg. If you burnt 1BNB equivalent of tokens, you would get 2BNB as your reward) • Returns will be capped at 2x and must be claimed manually from the website. • How fast the rewards are given is determined by the transaction volume. 1% of transaction volume will go to the rewards pool.
